trans-unit.source: Establishes a design-time service that manages the collection of <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionItem"></xref> objects for components.
trans-unit.target: Upprättar en designläge tjänsten som hanterar mängden <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionItem"> </xref> objekt för komponenter.

trans-unit.source: The DesignerActionService class is responsible for managing the collection of <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionItem> objects for each instance of a component that exists on a form at design time.
trans-unit.target: Klassen DesignerActionService ansvarar för att hantera mängden <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionItem>objekt för varje instans av en komponent som finns i ett formulär i designläge.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionItem>

trans-unit.source: This class enables a direct push model of item creation, and is primarily intended for use by design-time tool developers, although it can also be used by component and custom control developers.
trans-unit.target: Den här klassen kan en direct push-modell då objektet skapades och är främst avsedd att användas av designläge verktyget utvecklare, men kan även användas av komponenten och utvecklare av anpassad kontroll.

trans-unit.source: Design-time tool developers will need to determine the list of items to display for a component and determine when this list changes.
trans-unit.target: Designtid verktyget utvecklare behöver du fastställa listan med objekt som ska visas för en komponent och fastställa när den här listan ändras.

trans-unit.source: They may also create add-ins that operate in conjunction with smart tag panel objects.
trans-unit.target: De kan också skapa tillägg som fungerar tillsammans med smarta etiketter panelen objekt.

trans-unit.source: Advanced component developers may need to dynamically control the items associated with a component, thus replacing or supplementing the standard pull model.
trans-unit.target: Avancerade komponenten som utvecklare kan behöva dynamiskt Kontrollera objekt som är kopplade till en komponent, vilket ersätter eller kompletterar standard pull-modellen.

trans-unit.source: For example, panel commands can be altered depending on the context of their use and the design-time state of the component.
trans-unit.target: Kommandon kan till exempel ändras beroende på kontext och deras användning och designläge status på komponenten.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The DesignerActionService is actually the driving service behind both the push and pull models; however, in the latter case it operates implicitly.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > I DesignerActionService är faktiskt intresseväckande tjänst bakom modeller för både sändning och mottagning, men i det senare fallet den fungerar implicit.

trans-unit.source: DesignerActionService provides a straightforward interface for accessing and manipulating the items for each component, including the following methods and events: - The <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService.Contains%2A> method determines whether the DesignerActionService is currently managing a particular component.
trans-unit.target: DesignerActionService erbjuder ett enkelt gränssnitt för att komma åt och ändra objekt för varje komponent, inklusive följande metoder och händelser: – <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService.Contains%2A>metoden avgör om DesignerActionService för närvarande hanterar en viss komponent.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService.Contains%2A>

trans-unit.source: - The <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService.GetComponentActions%2A> method supports the enumeration of the lists of items.
trans-unit.target: - <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService.GetComponentActions%2A>Metoden stöder uppräkning av listan över objekt.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService.GetComponentActions%2A>

trans-unit.source: - The <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService.Add%2A> method allows adding a <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList> or <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection> to the set of existing items for a component instance.
trans-unit.target: - <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService.Add%2A>Metod kan du lägga till en <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList>eller <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection>till uppsättningen med befintliga objekt för en komponentinstans.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService.Add%2A>

trans-unit.source: In contrast, the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService.Remove%2A> method removes one or all of the item lists associated with a component.
trans-unit.target: Däremot den <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService.Remove%2A>metoden tar bort en eller alla objektlistor som är kopplade till en komponent.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService.Remove%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService.Add%2A> method represents the direct push model of associating panel items with a component.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Den <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService.Add%2A>metoden representerar direct push-modell för att associera objekt med en komponent.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService.Add%2A>

trans-unit.source: In contrast, the pull model relies on overriding the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentDesigner.ActionLists%2A> property of the designer class for that component.
trans-unit.target: Däremot pull-modellen förlitar sig på att åsidosätta den <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentDesigner.ActionLists%2A>egenskap i klassen designer för den komponenten.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentDesigner.ActionLists%2A>

trans-unit.source: The design environment is responsible for adding these items into the current DesignerActionService when a component is created on the design surface.
trans-unit.target: Design-miljön är ansvarig för att lägga till objekten i den aktuella DesignerActionService när en komponent har skapats i designvyn.

trans-unit.source: > [!IMPORTANT] > The <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService.Add%2A>, <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService.Remove%2A>, <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService.Contains%2A>, and <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService.Clear%2A> methods only consider or affect push-model items.
trans-unit.target: > [!IMPORTANT] > De <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService.Add%2A>, <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService.Remove%2A>, <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService.Contains%2A>, och <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService.Clear%2A>metoder endast överväga påverkas eller push-modellobjekt.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService.Clear%2A> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService.Contains%2A> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService.Remove%2A> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService.Add%2A>

trans-unit.source: - The <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService.DesignerActionListsChanged> event indicates when the collection of items changes for a component.
trans-unit.target: - <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService.DesignerActionListsChanged>Händelsen anger när mängden med objekt ändras för en komponent.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService.DesignerActionListsChanged>

trans-unit.source: Because it is often desirable to use some of the same panel items in both the component's design-time shortcut menu and its panel, a large degree of interoperability exists between <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionItem> objects and designer verbs.
trans-unit.target: Eftersom det är ofta önskvärt att använda en del av samma objekt på Kontrollpanelen i både komponentens designläge snabbmenyn och dess panel, finns en hög grad av driftskompatibilitet mellan <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionItem>objekt och designer verb.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionItem>

trans-unit.source: If a component designer does not explicitly specify a <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList> (that is, it does not contain an overridden <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentDesigner.ActionLists%2A> property), then a list will be created from existing designer verbs.
trans-unit.target: Om en Komponentdesigner inte uttryckligen anger ett <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList>(det vill säga den inte innehåller en åsidosatt <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentDesigner.ActionLists%2A>egenskapen), och sedan en lista skapas från befintliga designer verb.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentDesigner.ActionLists%2A> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList>

trans-unit.source: These verbs are specified by the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentDesigner.Verbs%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Dessa verb anges av den <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentDesigner.Verbs%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentDesigner.Verbs%2A>

trans-unit.source: In this case, an internal verb list class is used to contain the collection of verb item panel entries.
trans-unit.target: I det här fallet används en intern verb listan klass innehåller samlingen av verb panelen transaktioner.

trans-unit.source: If you want a <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionMethodItem> to be used both as a panel entry and a design-time shortcut menu entry, then you can set the `includeAsDesignerVerb` parameter in the item's constructor.
trans-unit.target: Om du vill att en <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionMethodItem>som ska användas både som en post i Kontrollpanelen och en designläge menyn genväg, du kan ange den `includeAsDesignerVerb` parameter i objektets konstruktor.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionMethodItem>

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIService> to control the display of your designer's <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentDesigner.ActionLists%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Använd för <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIService>att styra visningen av dina designer <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentDesigner.ActionLists%2A>.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentDesigner.ActionLists%2A> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIService>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Initierar en ny instans av den <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService"> </xref> klass.

trans-unit.source: A service provider is necessary for monitoring selection and component changes.
trans-unit.target: En tjänstprovider är nödvändigt för att övervaka val och komponentändringarna.

trans-unit.source: It is expected to support the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerHost> and <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IComponentChangeService> types.
trans-unit.target: Det förväntas att stödja den <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerHost>och <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IComponentChangeService>typer.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IComponentChangeService> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerHost>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService> class uses an internal table to manage components and their associated <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList> smart tags.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService>klassen använder en intern tabell för att hantera komponenter och deras associerad <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList>smarta etiketter.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService>

trans-unit.source: Typically, component developers will not need to create an instance of this class; instead, they can acquire an existing instance through a call to the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Component.GetService%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method.
trans-unit.target: Normalt behöver komponentutvecklare inte skapa en instans av den här klassen. i stället kan de få en befintlig instans via ett anrop till den <xref:System.ComponentModel.Component.GetService%2A?displayProperty=fullName>metoden.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Component.GetService%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The service provider for the current design-time environment.
trans-unit.target: Leverantören för den aktuella miljön i designläge.

trans-unit.source: Adds a <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList"></xref> to the current collection of managed smart tags.
trans-unit.target: Lägger till en <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList"> </xref> till den aktuella samlingen av hanterade smarta etiketter.

trans-unit.source: The Add method represents the push model of adding smart tag items.
trans-unit.target: Metoden Add representerar push-modell för att lägga till smarta etiketter.

trans-unit.source: The alternate pull model relies on overriding the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentDesigner.ActionLists%2A> property in the designer for the corresponding component.
trans-unit.target: Alternativa pull-modellen beroende åsidosätter den <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentDesigner.ActionLists%2A>egenskap i designern för motsvarande komponent.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentDesigner.ActionLists%2A>

trans-unit.source: When this method is called, the lists to be added are scanned for any <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionMethodItem> with the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionMethodItem.IncludeAsDesignerVerb%2A> property set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: När den här metoden anropas, genomsöks listor som ska läggas till för alla <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionMethodItem>med den <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionMethodItem.IncludeAsDesignerVerb%2A>egenskapen `true`.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionMethodItem.IncludeAsDesignerVerb%2A> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionMethodItem>

trans-unit.source: These items are added to the list of designer verbs for this component, through a call to the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.MenuCommandService.AddVerb%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method.
trans-unit.target: Dessa objekt läggs till i listan över designer verb för den här komponenten via ett anrop till den <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.MenuCommandService.AddVerb%2A?displayProperty=fullName>metoden.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.MenuCommandService.AddVerb%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Smart tags are managed on a component instance basis.
trans-unit.target: Smarta etiketter hanteras för komponenten instanser.

trans-unit.source: The managed collection may contain duplicate entries.
trans-unit.target: Den hanterade samlingen kan innehålla dubblettposter.

trans-unit.source: This method raises the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService.DesignerActionListsChanged> event.
trans-unit.target: Den här metoden genererar den <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService.DesignerActionListsChanged>händelse.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService.DesignerActionListsChanged>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.ComponentModel.IComponent"></xref> to associate the smart tags with.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.ComponentModel.IComponent"> </xref> ska associeras med smarta etiketter.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList"></xref> that contains the new smart tag items to be added.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList"> </xref> som innehåller nya smarta etiketter som ska läggas till.

trans-unit.source: One or both of the parameters are <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: En eller båda parametrarna är <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Adds a <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection"></xref> to the current collection of managed smart tags.
trans-unit.target: Lägger till en <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection"> </xref> till den aktuella samlingen av hanterade smarta etiketter.

trans-unit.source: The Add method represents the push model of adding smart tag items.
trans-unit.target: Metoden Add representerar push-modell för att lägga till smarta etiketter.

trans-unit.source: The alternate pull model relies on overriding the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentDesigner.ActionLists%2A> property in the designer for the corresponding component.
trans-unit.target: Alternativa pull-modellen beroende åsidosätter den <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentDesigner.ActionLists%2A>egenskap i designern för motsvarande komponent.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentDesigner.ActionLists%2A>

trans-unit.source: When this method is called, the lists to be added are scanned for any <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionMethodItem> with the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionMethodItem.IncludeAsDesignerVerb%2A> property set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: När den här metoden anropas, genomsöks listor som ska läggas till för alla <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionMethodItem>med den <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionMethodItem.IncludeAsDesignerVerb%2A>egenskapen `true`.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionMethodItem.IncludeAsDesignerVerb%2A> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionMethodItem>

trans-unit.source: These items are added to the list of designer verbs for this component, through a call to the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.MenuCommandService.AddVerb%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method.
trans-unit.target: Dessa objekt läggs till i listan över designer verb för den här komponenten via ett anrop till den <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.MenuCommandService.AddVerb%2A?displayProperty=fullName>metoden.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.MenuCommandService.AddVerb%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Smart tags are managed on a component instance basis.
trans-unit.target: Smarta etiketter hanteras för komponenten instanser.

trans-unit.source: The managed collection may contain duplicate entries.
trans-unit.target: Den hanterade samlingen kan innehålla dubblettposter.

trans-unit.source: This method raises the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService.DesignerActionListsChanged> event.
trans-unit.target: Den här metoden genererar den <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService.DesignerActionListsChanged>händelse.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService.DesignerActionListsChanged>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.ComponentModel.IComponent"></xref> to associate the smart tags with.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.ComponentModel.IComponent"> </xref> ska associeras med smarta etiketter.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection"></xref> that contains the new smart tag items to be added.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection"> </xref> som innehåller nya smarta etiketter som ska läggas till.

trans-unit.source: One or both of the parameters are <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: En eller båda parametrarna är <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Releases all components from management and clears all push-model smart tag lists.
trans-unit.target: Släpper alla komponenter från hanteringen och tar bort alla listor med smarta etiketter för push-modell.

trans-unit.source: The Clear method empties the internal table used to store information about components and their push-model smart tag lists.
trans-unit.target: Metoden Clear tömmer intern tabell som används för att lagra information om komponenter och deras listor med smarta etiketter för push-modell.

trans-unit.source: > [!CAUTION] > Because this method affects all components managed by the current service, and not just the current component, this method should be used judiciously.
trans-unit.target: > [!CAUTION] > Eftersom den här metoden påverkar alla komponenter som hanteras av tjänsten aktuella och inte bara den aktuella komponenten, den här metoden bör användas sparsamt.

trans-unit.source: Typically, the design-time tool developer uses it when resetting a design surface.
trans-unit.target: Normalt använder designläge verktyget utvecklaren den för att kunna återställa en designytan.

trans-unit.source: Component developers should use one of the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService.Remove%2A> methods instead to remove individual smart tag items or lists.
trans-unit.target: Komponentutvecklare bör använda en av de <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService.Remove%2A>metoder i stället om du vill ta bort enskilda smarta etiketter objekt eller listar.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService.Remove%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService.DesignerActionListsChanged> event is raised for each component that was previously managed by the current service.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService.DesignerActionListsChanged>händelse inträffar för varje komponent som tidigare hanterades av tjänsten aktuella.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService.DesignerActionListsChanged>

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the current smart tag service manages the action lists for the specified component.
trans-unit.target: Anger om aktuella smarta etiketter tjänsten hanterar listorna åtgärd för den angivna komponenten.

trans-unit.source: The Contains method only recognizes push-model smart tags, which are associated to a component with the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService.Add%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Metoden innehåller bara kan identifiera smarta etiketter för push-modell, som är kopplade till en komponent med den <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService.Add%2A>metoden.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService.Add%2A>

trans-unit.source: Although there is no structural limitation on the number of concurrent <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService> instances created by a design-time tool, typically only a single instance of the service is created per design surface.
trans-unit.target: Även om det finns ingen strukturella begränsning på antalet samtidiga <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService>instanser som skapats av ett verktyg i designläge bara en instans av tjänsten skapas vanligtvis per designytan.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.ComponentModel.IComponent"></xref> to search for.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.ComponentModel.IComponent"> </xref> att söka efter.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the component is managed by the current service; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Om komponenten som hanteras av tjänsten aktuella; Annars <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: comp is .
trans-unit.target: compis .

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList"></xref> is removed or added for any component.
trans-unit.target: Inträffar när en <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList"> </xref> tas bort eller lagts till för varje komponent.

trans-unit.source: The following table shows the set of specialized classes associated with the DesignerActionListsChanged event.
trans-unit.target: Följande tabell visar uppsättningen av särskilda klasser som är associerade med DesignerActionListsChanged-händelsen.

trans-unit.source: |Specialized type|Description| |----------------------|-----------------| |<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListsChangedEventArgs>|Adds information specific to smart tag list management.
trans-unit.target: | Specialiserad typ | Beskrivning | |----------------------|-----------------| | <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListsChangedEventArgs>| Lägger till information om hantering av listor över smarta etiketter.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListsChangedEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: This class is specialized from <xref:System.EventArgs>.| |<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListsChangedEventHandler>|Connects the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListsChangedEventArgs> with its handler.| |<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListsChangedType>|Denotes whether a list has been added or removed.| For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: Den här klassen är specialanpassat från <xref:System.EventArgs>. | | <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListsChangedEventHandler>| Ansluter <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListsChangedEventArgs>med dess hanterare. | | <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListsChangedType>| Anger om en lista har lagts till eller tagits bort. | Mer information om hur du hanterar händelser finns [NIB: förbrukar händelser](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListsChangedType> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListsChangedEventArgs> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListsChangedEventHandler> </xref:System.EventArgs>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som ska läggas till.

trans-unit.source: Releases all resources used by the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Frigör alla resurser som används av den <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService"> </xref> klass.

trans-unit.source: The Dispose method is the implementation of the only method mandated by the <xref:System.IDisposable> interface.
trans-unit.target: Metoden Dispose är implementering av den enda metoden som krävs av den <xref:System.IDisposable>gränssnitt.</xref:System.IDisposable>

trans-unit.source: Call this method when you are finished using the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService>.
trans-unit.target: Anropa den här metoden när du är klar med hjälp av <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService>.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService>

trans-unit.source: It performs two main actions: - Removes the current service from the list of available services in the design environment through a call to the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IServiceContainer.RemoveService%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Två huvudsakliga åtgärder utförs:-tar bort den aktuella tjänsten från listan över tillgängliga tjänster i designmiljön via ett anrop till den <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IServiceContainer.RemoveService%2A>metoden.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IServiceContainer.RemoveService%2A>

trans-unit.source: - Unsubscribes to component change events from the associated <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IComponentChangeService> interface.
trans-unit.target: -Länkar till komponenten händelser från den associerade <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IComponentChangeService>gränssnitt.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IComponentChangeService>

trans-unit.source: Call Dispose when you are finished using the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService>.
trans-unit.target: Anropa Dispose när du är klar med hjälp av <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService>.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService>

trans-unit.source: The Dispose method leaves the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService> in an unusable state.
trans-unit.target: Metoden Dispose lämnar den <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService>oanvändbar.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService>

trans-unit.source: After calling Dispose, you must release all references to the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService> so the garbage collector can reclaim the memory that the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService> was occupying.
trans-unit.target: När du anropar Dispose, måste du släppa alla referenser till den <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService>så skräpinsamlingen kan frigöra minne som den <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService>var upptar.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) and [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Mer information finns i [Rensa ohanterade resurser](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) och [implementera en metod för ta bort](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Always call Dispose before you release your last reference to the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService>.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Alltid anropet avyttra innan du släpper senaste referens till <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService>.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService>

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, the resources it is using will not be freed until the garbage collector calls the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService> object's `Finalize` method.
trans-unit.target: De resurser som den använder frigörs annars inte förrän skräpinsamlingen anrop av <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService>objektets `Finalize` metod.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService>

trans-unit.source: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService"></xref> and optionally releases the managed resources.
trans-unit.target: Släpper de ohanterade resurser som används av den <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService"> </xref> och släpper du de hantera resurserna.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService.Dispose%2A> method is the implementation of the only method mandated by the <xref:System.IDisposable> interface.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService.Dispose%2A>metoden är att genomföra den enda metoden som krävs av den <xref:System.IDisposable>gränssnitt.</xref:System.IDisposable> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService.Dispose%2A>

trans-unit.source: Call this method when you are finished using the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService>.
trans-unit.target: Anropa den här metoden när du är klar med hjälp av <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService>.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService>

trans-unit.source: It performs two main actions: - Removes the current service from the list of available services in the design environment through a call to the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IServiceContainer.RemoveService%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Två huvudsakliga åtgärder utförs:-tar bort den aktuella tjänsten från listan över tillgängliga tjänster i designmiljön via ett anrop till den <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IServiceContainer.RemoveService%2A>metoden.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IServiceContainer.RemoveService%2A>

trans-unit.source: - Unsubscribes to component change events from the associated <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IComponentChangeService> interface.
trans-unit.target: -Länkar till komponenten händelser från den associerade <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IComponentChangeService>gränssnitt.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IComponentChangeService>

trans-unit.source: This method is called by the public `Dispose()` method and the <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Den här metoden anropas av allmänheten `Dispose()` metod och <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>metod.</xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>

trans-unit.source: `Dispose()` invokes the protected `Dispose(Boolean)` method with the `disposing` parameter set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: `Dispose()`anropar den skyddade `Dispose(Boolean)` metod med den `disposing` parametern `true`.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> invokes `Dispose` with `disposing` set to `false`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>anropar `Dispose` med `disposing` inställd på `false`.</xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>

trans-unit.source: When the `disposing` parameter is `true`, this method releases all resources held by any managed objects that this <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService> references.
trans-unit.target: När den `disposing` parametern är `true`, den här metoden Frigör alla resurser som innehas av alla hanterade objekt som den här <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService>referenser.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService>

trans-unit.source: This method invokes the `Dispose()` method of each referenced object.
trans-unit.target: Den här metoden startar den `Dispose()` metod för varje refererade till objekt.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to release both managed and unmanaged resources; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> to release only unmanaged resources.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Frisläpp både hanterade och ohanterade resurser. <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> att släppa endast resurser som inte hanteras.

trans-unit.source: Returns the collection of smart tag item lists associated with a component.
trans-unit.target: Returnerar mängden med listor med smarta etiketter objekt som är kopplade till en komponent.

trans-unit.source: The GetComponentActions method is equivalent to a call to the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService.GetComponentActions%28System.ComponentModel.IComponent%2CSystem.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentActionsType%29> method using a `type` parameter of <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentActionsType>.
trans-unit.target: Metoden GetComponentActions motsvarar ett anrop till den <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService.GetComponentActions%28System.ComponentModel.IComponent%2CSystem.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentActionsType%29>metod med en `type` parametern <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentActionsType>.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentActionsType> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService.GetComponentActions%28System.ComponentModel.IComponent%2CSystem.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentActionsType%29>

trans-unit.source: Therefore, the collection returned will contain both the push and pull lists of smart tags.
trans-unit.target: Den samling som returnerade kommer därför innehåller både sändning och mottagning listor med smarta etiketter.

trans-unit.source: The returned <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection> is the union of item lists added through the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService.Add%2A> methods and also the lists obtained from the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerCommandSet> instance obtained from the component’s site.
trans-unit.target: Den returnerade <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection>är unionen av objektlistor som lagts till via den <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService.Add%2A>metoder och listorna hämtas från den <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerCommandSet>instans som erhållits från komponentens plats.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerCommandSet> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService.Add%2A> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection>

trans-unit.source: The component that the smart tags are associated with.
trans-unit.target: Den komponent som smarta etiketter är associerade med.

trans-unit.source: The collection of smart tags for the specified component.
trans-unit.target: Mängden med smarta etiketter för den angivna komponenten.

trans-unit.source: comp is .
trans-unit.target: compis .

trans-unit.source: Returns the collection of smart tag item lists of the specified type associated with a component.
trans-unit.target: Returnerar mängden med smarta etiketter objektlistor med den angivna typen är associerade med en.

trans-unit.source: This version of the overloaded <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService.GetComponentActions%2A> method filters on the `type` parameter, which can have one of the following values.
trans-unit.target: Den här versionen av den överlagrade <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService.GetComponentActions%2A>metoden filtrerar på den `type` som kan ha ett av följande värden.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService.GetComponentActions%2A>

trans-unit.source: |Value|Description| |-----------|-----------------| |<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentActionsType>|All associated smart tags.| |<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentActionsType>|Pull-model smart tags only.| |<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentActionsType>|Push-model smart tags only.| If the associated designer for a component does not supply a pull-model smart tag list, then the GetComponentActions method will instead use the designer's design-time shortcut menu items from the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentDesigner.Verbs%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: | Värdet | Beskrivning | |-----------|-----------------| | <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentActionsType>| Alla tillhörande smarta etiketter. | | <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentActionsType>| Pull-modell smarta etiketter endast. | | <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentActionsType>| Push-modell smarta etiketter endast. | Om associerade designer för en komponent som inte anger en lista med smarta etiketter för pull-modell och sedan metoden GetComponentActions kommer i stället använda i designer designläge menyobjekt på snabbmenyn från den <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentDesigner.Verbs%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentDesigner.Verbs%2A> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentActionsType> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentActionsType> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentActionsType>

trans-unit.source: The component that the smart tags are associated with.
trans-unit.target: Den komponent som smarta etiketter är associerade med.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentActionsType"></xref> to filter the associated smart tags with.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentActionsType"> </xref> att filtrera de associera smarta etiketterna med.

trans-unit.source: The collection of smart tags of the specified type for the specified component.
trans-unit.target: Mängden med smarta etiketter för den angivna typen för den angivna komponenten.

trans-unit.source: comp is .
trans-unit.target: compis .

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the pull-model smart tags associated with a component.
trans-unit.target: Hämtar pull-modell smarta etiketter som är kopplade till en komponent.

trans-unit.source: The GetComponentDesignerActions method is a helper method for the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService.GetComponentActions%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: Metoden GetComponentDesignerActions är en hjälpmetod för den <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService.GetComponentActions%2A>metoder.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService.GetComponentActions%2A>

trans-unit.source: GetComponentDesignerActions searches for pull-model smart tags of type <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentActionsType>, and then adds these to the supplied `actionLists` collection.
trans-unit.target: GetComponentDesignerActions söker efter pull-modell smarta etiketter av typen <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentActionsType>, och lägger sedan till dem till den angivna `actionLists` samling.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentActionsType>

trans-unit.source: If the component's developer does not explicitly supply a collection of smart tags through the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentDesigner.ActionLists%2A> property of its designer, this method will reuse the design-time shortcut menu entries, which are obtained through the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentDesigner.Verbs%2A> property of the designer.
trans-unit.target: Om komponentens developer inte uttryckligen anger en samling med smarta etiketter via den <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentDesigner.ActionLists%2A>egenskapen dess Designer den här metoden ska återanvända menyalternativ designläge genväg som erhållits via den <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentDesigner.Verbs%2A>egenskapen för designern.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentDesigner.Verbs%2A> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentDesigner.ActionLists%2A>

trans-unit.source: The component that the smart tags are associated with.
trans-unit.target: Den komponent som smarta etiketter är associerade med.

trans-unit.source: The collection to add the associated smart tags to.
trans-unit.target: Att lägga till de associera smarta etiketterna till samlingen.

trans-unit.source: One or both of the parameters are <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: En eller båda parametrarna är <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the push-model smart tags associated with a component.
trans-unit.target: Hämtar push-modell smarta etiketter som är kopplade till en komponent.

trans-unit.source: The GetComponentServiceActions method is a helper method for the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService.GetComponentActions%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: Metoden GetComponentServiceActions är en hjälpmetod för den <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService.GetComponentActions%2A>metoder.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService.GetComponentActions%2A>

trans-unit.source: It searches for push-model smart tags of type <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentActionsType>, and then adds these to the supplied `actionLists` collection.
trans-unit.target: Den söker efter smarta etiketter för push-modell av typen <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentActionsType>, och lägger sedan till dem till den angivna `actionLists` samling.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentActionsType>

trans-unit.source: The component that the smart tags are associated with.
trans-unit.target: Den komponent som smarta etiketter är associerade med.

trans-unit.source: The collection to add the associated smart tags to.
trans-unit.target: Att lägga till de associera smarta etiketterna till samlingen.

trans-unit.source: One or both of the parameters are <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: En eller båda parametrarna är <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Removes the specified smart tag list from all components managed by the current service.
trans-unit.target: Tar bort listan över angivna smarta etiketter från alla komponenter som hanteras av den aktuella servicen.

trans-unit.source: This version of the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService.Remove%2A> method is typically used by design tool developers, because component developers typically do not know what other components exist in the current design space.
trans-unit.target: Den här versionen av den <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService.Remove%2A>metoden används vanligtvis av design verktyget utvecklare, eftersom komponentutvecklare vanligtvis inte vet vilka andra komponenter finns i designutrymmet som.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService.Remove%2A>

trans-unit.source: If successful, this method raises the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService.DesignerActionListsChanged> event.
trans-unit.target: Om autentiseringen lyckas kan den här metoden genererar den <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService.DesignerActionListsChanged>händelse.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService.DesignerActionListsChanged>

trans-unit.source: The list of smart tags to be removed.
trans-unit.target: Lista över smarta etiketter ska tas bort.

trans-unit.source: actionList is .
trans-unit.target: actionListis .

trans-unit.source: Removes all the smart tag lists associated with the specified component.
trans-unit.target: Tar bort alla de listor med smarta etiketter som associeras med den angivna komponenten.

trans-unit.source: If successful, the Remove method raises the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService.DesignerActionListsChanged> event.
trans-unit.target: Om lyckas ta bort metoden genererar den <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService.DesignerActionListsChanged>händelse.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService.DesignerActionListsChanged>

trans-unit.source: The component to disassociate the smart tags from.
trans-unit.target: Koppla smarta etiketter från komponenten.

trans-unit.source: comp is .
trans-unit.target: compis .

trans-unit.source: Removes the specified smart tag list from the specified component.
trans-unit.target: Tar bort listan över angivna smarta etiketter från den angivna komponenten.

trans-unit.source: If successful, the Remove method raises the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService.DesignerActionListsChanged> event.
trans-unit.target: Om lyckas ta bort metoden genererar den <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService.DesignerActionListsChanged>händelse.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService.DesignerActionListsChanged>

trans-unit.source: The component to disassociate the smart tags from.
trans-unit.target: Koppla smarta etiketter från komponenten.

trans-unit.source: The smart tag list to remove.
trans-unit.target: Lista med smarta etiketter ska tas bort.

trans-unit.source: One or both of the parameters are <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: En eller båda parametrarna är <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.
